Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the term "reportable business relationship" as it relates to certain employees of the state university of New York and the city university of New York
Summary: Relates to the term "reportable business relationship" as it relates to certain employees of the state university of New York and the city university of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to the term "reportable business relationship" as it relates to certain employees of the state university of New York and the city university of New York
